title: Stuck erigon v2.29.0
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2.29.0-stable-011a54a2`

OS & Version: CentOS Stream 9

Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour

Normal archival syncing at head

#### Actual behaviour

Stuck archival syncing at head

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

```
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/erigon \
    --datadir=/ethereum-mainnet/erigon \
    --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 \
    --authrpc.jwtsecret=/ethereum-mainnet/erigon-jwt/jwt.hex \
    --port 30303 \
    --http \
    --ws \
    --http.api=engine,eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool \
    --metrics
```
